verses.text: \w I|strong="H3117"\w* love \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w strength|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* rock, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* fortress, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* deliverer; \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* rock, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w I|strong="H3068"\w* take refuge; \w my|strong="H3068"\w* shield, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* horn \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* salvation, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* high tower.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* call \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* worthy \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* praised; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* saved \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemies.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* cords \w of|strong="H3068"\w* death surrounded \w me|strong="H7121"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* floods \w of|strong="H3068"\w* ungodliness \w made|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* afraid.

\w The|strong="H4194"\w* \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H5158"\w* Sheol\f + \fr 18:5 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead.\f* \w were|strong="H4194"\w* around me. \w The|strong="H4194"\w* snares \w of|strong="H5158"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* came \w on|strong="H4194"\w* me.

\w In|strong="H7585"\w* \w my|strong="H5437"\w* distress \w I|strong="H4194"\w* called \w on|strong="H4194"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H5437"\w* cried \w to|strong="H5437"\w* \w my|strong="H5437"\w* God. \w He|strong="H4194"\w* heard \w my|strong="H5437"\w* voice \w out|strong="H5437"\w* \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w his|strong="H5437"\w* temple. \w My|strong="H5437"\w* cry \w before|strong="H6923"\w* \w him|strong="H7585"\w* came into \w his|strong="H5437"\w* ears.

\w Then|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth shook \w and|strong="H3068"\w* trembled. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* foundations \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mountains quaked \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H3068"\w* shaken, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* angry.

Smoke went \w out|strong="H7264"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* nostrils. Consuming fire came \w out|strong="H7264"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* mouth. Coals \w were|strong="H2022"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w by|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* bowed \w the|strong="H4480"\w* heavens also, \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* down. Thick darkness \w was|strong="H6310"\w* \w under|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* feet.

\w He|strong="H7272"\w* rode \w on|strong="H8478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cherub, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* flew. Yes, \w he|strong="H7272"\w* soared \w on|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* wings \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* wind.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H7307"\w* darkness \w his|strong="H5921"\w* hiding place, \w his|strong="H5921"\w* pavilion \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, darkness \w of|strong="H7307"\w* waters, thick clouds \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w skies|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w At|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5439"\w* brightness before \w him|strong="H7896"\w* \w his|strong="H7896"\w* \w thick|strong="H5645"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* \w passed|strong="H4325"\w*, hailstones \w and|strong="H4325"\w* coals \w of|strong="H4325"\w* fire.

\w The|strong="H5674"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H1259"\w* thundered \w in|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* sky. \w The|strong="H5674"\w* Most High uttered \w his|strong="H5674"\w* voice: \w hailstones|strong="H1259"\w* \w and|strong="H5674"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* \w of|strong="H1513"\w* \w fire|strong="H1513"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* arrows, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* scattered \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* routed \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* great lightning bolts.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* channels \w of|strong="H2671"\w* waters appeared. \w The|strong="H7971"\w* foundations \w of|strong="H2671"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* world were \w laid|strong="H7971"\w* bare \w at|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* rebuke, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w at|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* blast \w of|strong="H2671"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* breath \w of|strong="H2671"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* nostrils.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H1540"\w* \w from|strong="H1540"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* high. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* took \w me|strong="H7200"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* drew \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w many|strong="H7200"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7971"\w* \w delivered|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* strong enemy, \w from|strong="H7971"\w* those \w who|strong="H7227"\w* hated \w me|strong="H7971"\w*; \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H3947"\w* \w were|strong="H4325"\w* \w too|strong="H7227"\w* \w mighty|strong="H7227"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H5794"\w* \w on|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H8130"\w* \w in|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* day \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* calamity, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* was \w my|strong="H5337"\w* support.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w* out \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* large \w place|strong="H1961"\w*. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w because|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* delighted \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* rewarded \w me|strong="H3318"\w* according \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* righteousness. According \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cleanness \w of|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* hands, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* recompensed \w me|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* kept \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ways \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* wickedly departed \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* ordinances \w were|strong="H1870"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* didn’t \w put|strong="H3068"\w* \w away|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* statutes \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* blameless \w with|strong="H4941"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* kept myself \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* iniquity.

\w Therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* rewarded \w me|strong="H8104"\w* according \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* righteousness, according \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* cleanness \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* hands \w in|strong="H8549"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* eyesight.

\w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* merciful \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* show yourself merciful. \w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* perfect man, \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* show yourself perfect.

\w With|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* pure, \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w will|strong="H8549"\w* \w show|strong="H8552"\w* \w yourself|strong="H2616"\w* pure. \w With|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* crooked \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w will|strong="H8549"\w* \w show|strong="H8552"\w* \w yourself|strong="H2616"\w* shrewd.

\w For|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* will save \w the|strong="H5973"\w* afflicted people, \w but|strong="H6617"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* arrogant eyes \w you|strong="H5973"\w* will bring down.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* light \w my|strong="H7311"\w* lamp, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w My|strong="H7311"\w* God \w will|strong="H5971"\w* light \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w my|strong="H7311"\w* darkness.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* advance \w through|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* troop. \w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* leap \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wall.

\w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* God, \w his|strong="H3588"\w* way \w is|strong="H3588"\w* perfect. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s word \w is|strong="H3588"\w* tried. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shield \w to|strong="H7323"\w* all \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, except \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? \w Who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rock, besides \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* arms \w me|strong="H1107"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H6697"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w makes|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* way perfect?

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* \w makes|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* feet \w like|strong="H1870"\w* deer’s feet, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* sets \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* high places.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* teaches \w my|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w to|strong="H5921"\w* war, \w so|strong="H5975"\w* \w that|strong="H1116"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* arms bend \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bow \w of|strong="H5921"\w* bronze.

\w You|strong="H3925"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w also|strong="H3027"\w* \w given|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H3925"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* shield \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* salvation. \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* right \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* sustains \w me|strong="H3925"\w*. \w Your|strong="H3027"\w* gentleness \w has|strong="H3027"\w* made \w me|strong="H3925"\w* great.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* enlarged \w my|strong="H5414"\w* steps \w under|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w My|strong="H5414"\w* feet \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* slipped.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* pursue \w my|strong="H8478"\w* enemies, \w and|strong="H3808"\w* overtake \w them|strong="H8478"\w*. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* won’t turn away until \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H8478"\w* consumed.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* strike \w them|strong="H7725"\w* through, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H5381"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* rise. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* fall under \w my|strong="H7725"\w* feet.

\w For|strong="H8478"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H7272"\w* armed \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H6965"\w* strength \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* battle. \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H7272"\w* subdued \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* those \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H6965"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w You|strong="H8478"\w* \w have|strong="H2428"\w* also made \w my|strong="H6965"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w* turn \w their|strong="H8478"\w* backs \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w me|strong="H3766"\w*, \w that|strong="H4421"\w* \w I|strong="H6965"\w* \w might|strong="H2428"\w* cut off those \w who|strong="H4421"\w* hate \w me|strong="H3766"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5414"\w* \w cried|strong="H5414"\w*, but there \w was|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* one \w to|strong="H5414"\w* save; even \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, but \w he|strong="H5414"\w* didn’t answer \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* beat \w them|strong="H5921"\w* small \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* dust \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wind. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w cast|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mire \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* streets.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* delivered \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* strivings \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* people. \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H7307"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H6440"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* people \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w* known \w shall|strong="H7307"\w* \w serve|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w As|strong="H5971"\w* soon \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* hear \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w obey|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w*. \w The|strong="H5647"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H1471"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* submit \w themselves|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* fade away, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* come trembling out \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* strongholds.
\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* lives! Blessed \w be|strong="H1121"\w* my rock. Exalted \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* my salvation,

\w even|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* executes vengeance \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7311"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* subdues peoples under \w me|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* rescues \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* enemies. Yes, \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w lift|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* above \w those|strong="H1696"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* rise \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* violent man.

Therefore \w I|strong="H6965"\w* \w will|strong="H2555"\w* \w give|strong="H7311"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* nations, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w will|strong="H2555"\w* sing praises \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* name.

\w He|strong="H3651"\w* gives great deliverance \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* shows loving kindness \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* anointed, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* David \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* offspring,\f + \fr 18:50 \ft or, seed\f* forever \w more|strong="H3651"\w*.
